lb:
Reduces [Main Battery] CD by 4 seconds.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 2.

During [Main Battery Salvo], adds a chance to activate [Cut-in].
Secret Plan upgraded to Level 2.

Increases [Main Battery Salvo] damage by 20%.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 3.

Increases [Secondary Battery] damage by 50%.
Secret Plan upgraded to Level 3.

When [Secondary Battery] is firing, firing a [Main Battery Salvo] will deal 200% more damage, will assume T-Adv for damage. Can only proc once per battle.
Refined Taste upgraded to Level 4.

traits.name: Secret Plan
traits.text: Increase Workshop and Bar production by 2%/3%/4%

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Can attack from medium range, reload time: 12s
Can launch torpedoes from medium range; another torpedo cannot be fired unless an already launched torpedo has hit the enemy/expired

skills.name:
Hazy Moon
覇月の朧
skills.text: 1. On [Main Battery Salvo], all allies gain "Hazuki". On [Secondary Battery Salvo], all allies gain "Oborotsuki".2. Every time Takao gains either ”Hazuki", "Oborotsuki" or "Mugetsu", increases damage by 10%.Can only proc once per battle.

skills.name:
Extermination - Violence
鏖殺・破勢
skills.text:
1. When Takao has both "Hazuki" and "Oborotsuki", reloads [Main Battery] immediately. Afterwards, remove both "Hazuki" and "Oborotsuki".
2. When Takao has all 3 "Hazuki", "Oborotsuki" and "Mugetsu", deals 100% of Takao's Firepower to the lowest health enemy. Afterwards, removes all 3 effects.

skills.name:
Full Moon
満ちる月
skills.text: On [Main Battery Salvo], increases [Main Battery] damage by 6%. Stacks indefinitely and lasts until the end of battle.

comment: Carefree and self-centered, Takao is not very interested in fighting. Is careful with her words, and smiles even when angry. Is good friends with the lazy Wasp.
